context.commit_message:
ðŸ”§ Fix KM server setup to copy local server files

- Copy local km_server.py and supporting files to project directory
- Use local Python KM server instead of external 'km' command
- Now 'super-agents start' will work without needing pip install knowledge-manager
- Each project gets its own complete KM server copy

Fixes the issue where super-agents was only configuring ports but not copying the actual server files.
